```{r}
#------------------
# GET DATA
#------------------
 file.lca <-
    list.files("./RawData_doNotUpload/LCAdat", pattern = ".xls", full.names=TRUE, recursive = FALSE) %>%
    lapply(
        read_excel, 
        skip=2) %>% # Skip meta-data rows
        #col_types = '_iii_____d_________________') %>% #choose only columns of interest
    bind_rows()
```
